entry.title: Lab 1: GitHub and Azure VM setup
entry.summary: Created my GitHub account, created my Azure VM, and connected my class repository to the VM.
entry.content: This lab involved setting up a GitHub account, creating an Azure VM, and linking the class repository to the VM.

entry.title: Lab 2: Create your Resume
entry.summary: Created my resume using HTML and CSS.
entry.content: This lab involved creating a resume using HTML and CSS to structure and style the content.

entry.title: Lab 3: Create a personal website
entry.summary: Created my personal website that includes a homepage, my projects, contact info, and personal info using HTML and CSS.
entry.content: This lab involved creating a personal website with multiple pages, including a homepage, projects, contact info, and personal details, using HTML and CSS.

entry.title: Lab 4: Create an RSS and Atom feed
entry.summary: Created RSS and Atom feeds for my ITWS labs.
entry.content: This lab involved creating RSS and Atom feeds to syndicate updates for the ITWS labs.
